Mini-Festo

Coalescence is an opportunity to disconnect from technology and come together to celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over this three day event, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

Vision

Coalescence is an opportunity to disconnect from technology and come together to celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over this three day event, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

Audience

Coalescence is an opportunity to disconnect from technology and come together to celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over this three day event, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

Principles

Coalescence is an opportunity to disconnect from technology and come together to celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over this three day event, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.

Social Responsibility

Coalescence is an opportunity to disconnect from technology and come together to celebrate nature through camping, outdoor activities and community. Over this three day event, we can begin to reconnect with ourselves, each other and nature.
